job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Automation Engineer / Original Machine Learning Engineer

Fort Collins, Colorado, USA, 80528

Location: Fort Collins, CO

Duration: 6 Months



Required Skills


  • 7+ years of professional work experience optimizing DL/ML models for commercial deployment
  • 7+ years of bench-marking, testing, and debugging models for most efficient performance on x86 CPU and Nvidia GPU architectures
  • Hands-on experience using scripting languages such as Python, C/C++
  • Familiarity with hardware architectures beyond CPU and GPU (e.g., TPU, VPU, FPGA, etc.)
  • Experience with most popular Deep Learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.) and Machine Learning Techniques
  • Proven track record of successful implementation and deployment of DL/ML models at scale
  • Familiarity with general test automation for complex systems in public/private cloud


TPU, VPU, FPGA,PyTorch, TensorFlow,GPU architectures, Python, C/C++,DL/ML models,x86 CPU
